attributes.action: ensure every petrol station in the country stocks One Alternative Fuel that is the same throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every time I go to a Petrol station, I find it frustrating & annoying that I am limited to using Petrol (or diesel in other cars), which is bad for the environment & is expensive.

Wouldn't it be better for the environment if there was a pump for Alcohol or Pure Biodiesel? Wouldn't that substantially reduce Global Warming? And wouldn't that mean you could reintroduce the fuel price escalator on fossil fuels & reduce the deficit?

There is so much wool around this subject, but I think a determined government could easily make this happen & thus put us years ahead of our competitors.
